name: To the Limit
description: The IFAC is over, but its impact is being felt far and wide. While many are excited for the next event, some have taken the spirit of competition to darker places. Ensure the IFAC's legacy and future prospects remain untainted.
rules:
-- There are two Phases to this Event! Each Phase is individually timed.
-- In this Hybrid Event, you will complete Faction Missions in one phase, and Supply Missions in another phase.
-- Unique Cardassian, Dominion, and Section 31 Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using Horseback Picard, any version of T. Mayweather, M. Burnham, Leeta, or Athletes will provide a bonus to Faction Missions and Supply Missions.
-- Every Faction or Supply Mission you complete earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- Community Rewards are also available during Phase 2 only. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock these rewards before the phase change!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Horseback Picard, T. Mayweather, M. Burnham, Leeta, or Athletes
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: D'Erika
featured_crew.flavor: D'Erika stages her own kidnapping on the eve of her wedding with one goal - to return her sister D'Vana to the Syndicate.

action.name: Wow, Did Starfleet Teach You Those Amazing Detective Skills?

featured_crew.name: Burnham
featured_crew.flavor: Burnham and Tilly forge a fierce friendship that helps both of them overcome the obstacles facing them together, bringing out the best in each other.

action.name: See Your Path. Stay On It. Reach Your Destination.

featured_crew.name: Leeta
featured_crew.flavor: As an amateur sociologist, Leeta was happy to take part in the zhian'tara ritual. She helped Emony relive her gymnastics career for a while.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.flavor: As an amateur sociologist, Leeta was happy to take part in the zhian'tara ritual. She helped Emony relive her gymnastics career for a while.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: D'Erika
rewards.flavor: D'Erika stages her own kidnapping on the eve of her wedding with one goal - to return her sister D'Vana to the Syndicate.

adventures.name: Find the Leak
adventures.description: Find the lapse in security that enabled the leak.

adventures.name: Locked Down
adventures.description: Contain any possible spread of the data.

adventures.name: Track Down the Thieves
adventures.description: Locate the thieves and recover the data.

adventures.name: The Right Stuff
adventures.description: Recover the stolen data from the competition.

rewards.name: To the Limit
rewards.flavor: Event Victory Points

adventures.name: Secured and Safe
adventures.description: Update security on all transporters and biobeds.

adventures.name: Who and Where
adventures.description: Evaluate who had access to the data and how.

adventures.name: You Are Who You Were
adventures.description: Confirm existing data hasn't been altered.

adventures.name: The Right Stuff
adventures.description: Recover the stolen data from the competition.

rewards.name: To the Limit
rewards.flavor: Event Victory Points

rewards.name: Leeta
rewards.flavor: As an amateur sociologist, Leeta was happy to take part in the zhian'tara ritual. She helped Emony relive her gymnastics career for a while.

rewards.name: Burnham
rewards.flavor: Burnham and Tilly forge a fierce friendship that helps both of them overcome the obstacles facing them together, bringing out the best in each other.

action.name: See Your Path. Stay On It. Reach Your Destination.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

screens.text: "That last match was more intense than I expected. I don't know if I've lost my edge, but I've never seen a Romulan move like that. It felt...off somehow."

"You're not alone. It definitely felt like something was in the air towards the end. And hearing some of the other factions' athletes talking, I think some of these factions came for more than just a friendly competition."
"I've heard more than a few disturbing rumors about Federation athletes as well. Even some people saying things as out there as Starfleet is experimenting on its athletes."

"I can't - don't want to - believe that our sportsmanship has fallen that far, but it appears an investigation is in order. To ensure everyone is playing fairly and in good faith for the next games, and to clear up any unsavory allegations."
"That last match was more intense than I expected. I don't know if I've lost my edge, but I've never seen a Romulan move like that. It felt...off somehow."

"You're not alone. It definitely felt like something was in the air towards the end. And hearing some of the other factions' athletes talking, I think some of these factions came for more than just a friendly competition."
"I've heard more than a few disturbing rumors about Federation athletes as well. Even some people saying things as out there as Starfleet is experimenting on its athletes."

"I can't - don't want to - believe that our sportsmanship has fallen that far, but it appears an investigation is in order. To ensure everyone is playing fairly and in good faith for the next games, and to clear up any unsavory allegations."
"That last match was more intense than I expected. I don't know if I've lost my edge, but I've never seen a Romulan move like that. It felt...off somehow."

"You're not alone. It definitely felt like something was in the air towards the end. And hearing some of the other factions' athletes talking, I think some of these factions came for more than just a friendly competition."
"I've heard more than a few disturbing rumors about Federation athletes as well. Even some people saying things as out there as Starfleet is experimenting on its athletes."

"I can't - don't want to - believe that our sportsmanship has fallen that far, but it appears an investigation is in order. To ensure everyone is playing fairly and in good faith for the next games, and to clear up any unsavory allegations."

"I appreciate the diligence, Captain. Your investigation yielded something curious and I followed up on it. It looks like there was a venue-wide data breach during the competition. Whoever was responsible obtained data on every participant, spectator, staff member, and attendee."
"It's strange that it wasn't just a specific group, like just the athletes or just the VIPs. And it sounds like the data they took was pretty specific. Any leads on who it could have been?"

responses.text: "You all seem to think this is about more than an athletic competition?"

screens.text: "Considering all the factions trying to get the edge in future competitions - or conflicts - we're spoiled for our choice of suspects."

"Predominantly medical and biological. Which would make sense if someone were trying to get the edge on the competition. But the hit on the pattern buffers of nearby transporters is my real concern. I don't like the possible implications there."

"I don't know. But I don't like how much they got from the transporter pattern buffers. You wanna figure out how muscular some Klingon boxer is? Fine. But all that other biodata worries me. They even hit our biobeds somehow."

"The problem is, like Travis said, there are too many potential suspects. If you ask me, I don't think we're talking about one or two hackers from just one faction here. This whole thing seems too big."
"We're counting on you, Captain. Find the culprits, recover that data, and see to it that it's not used for malicious ends."
